meanings.definition: A fabric made of camel or goat hair.
meanings.sent1: The camlet was soft and warm.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful camlet scarf.
meanings.sent3: The camlet fabric danced in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His words were woven with camlet threads of sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The camlet material felt luxurious against her skin.

meanings.definition: A garment made of camlet fabric.
meanings.sent1: Her camlet coat kept her cozy in the cold.
meanings.sent2: The camlet dress shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to be a camlet superhero.
meanings.sent4: She wrapped herself in a camlet cloak of confidence.
meanings.sent5: The camlet outfit was the talk of the party.

meanings.sent1: She decided to camlet the chair for a new look.
meanings.sent2: He camleted the table for a fancy dinner.
meanings.sent3: The magician camleted the rabbit for a disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The snow camleted the town in a blanket of white.
meanings.sent5: The artist camleted the canvas with vibrant colors.
